::KitKat::

"Ah Terrorsaur.  I have come up with an idea that will help out the 
Predacons greatly.  Since we were defeated in the last battle, 
Megatron doesn't think to highly of us right now.  So I fugured out a 
way to gain his respect back for all of us. I have the plans here for 
the Cybertron Fire, a maximal ship, and the Iron Fist.  If we can get 
into the Cybertron Fire, kill all the Maximals inside, and take over 
the ship, Megatron would have no choice but to be pleased with us.  
We will turn the ship over to Megatron as soon as we take control. 
Then we can all go back to Cybertron."  She smiled at him hoping he 
would go for it.
"Well what do you think? Don't you want to go back home?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Terrorsaur:
> 
> 
> 
> Terrorsaur stood up. "What secret mission?" he asked, but Drill Bit 
> had already left. He looked to Land Mine and Time Bomb, wondering 
> what was going on. He followed Drill Bit's path to KitKat's 
quarters. 
> He didn't fully enter, instead in stood in the threshold of the 
> section. 
> 
> "What secret mission?" he asked the wolf and the beatle.
